verses.english: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?
verses.hausa: Ba Mu bũɗa maka zũciyarka ba (dõmin ɗaukar haƙuri da fahimta)?

verses.english: And We removed from you your burden
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka saryar maka da nauyinka, Ashe.

verses.english: Which had weighed upon your back
And raised high for you your repute.
For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
verses.hausa: To, lalle ne tãre da tsananin nan akwai wani sauƙi.
Lalle ne tãre da tsananin nan akwai wani sauƙi.

verses.english: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka idan ka ƙãre (ibãda) sai ka kafu (kana rõƙon Allah).

verses.english: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.
verses.hausa: Kuma zuwa ga Ubangijinka ka yi kwaɗayi.
